title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 215.14 - Group or quasi-group implications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 215.14 - Group or quasi-group implications

State Regulations

An advertisement of a particular policy shall not state or imply that prospective insureds become group or quasi-group members covered under a group policy and as such enjoy special rates or underwriting privileges, unless such is the fact. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
215.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
